tool_description: music news based on a keyword from top sources around the globe
name: music-news-API
title: music-news-API

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the news from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://music-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/nytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "music-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://music-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "music-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News
